## admiral host view

view host details

### Synopsis

View host information by hostname (-n,--hostname) ip (--ip) or host id (--id)

```
admiral host view [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for view
  -n, --hostname string   base hostname
      --id int            host id
      --ip string         host ip
      --json              print as json
```

